basic_query.input: What is the capital of France?

complex_query.input: Who won the 2024 Taiwan election and what are their main policies? Reply to user in Taiwanese Traditional Chinese.
expected_plan_steps: Search for the winner of the 2024 Taiwan presidential election
Search for the main policies of the winning candidate
Combine the information and provide a comprehensive answer
